content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own tulip square bum bag using this crochet pattern in pdf format this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the measurements are width 13″ / 33 cm height 5″ / 13 cm strap 17″ / 43 cm the printable pdf has a total of 10 pages including * written pattern in us terms * photo tutorial * graph for the square * video tutorial available on youtube pdf is available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/tulip-square-bum-bag ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
